sourcesContent:
import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import { Post } from '../../../types/blog.type'; import { AppDispatch } from '../../../store'; import { addPost } from '../../blog.reducer'; import { AppContext } from '../../../contexts/app.context'; const initialState = { title: '', description: '', publishDate: '', id: '', featuredImage: '', published: false } const CreatePost = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState(initialState); const { isEdit } = useContext(AppContext) const dispatch = useDispatch() const handleSubmit = (e: React.FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault(); const formDataWithId = {...formData, id: new Date().toISOString()} dispatch(addPost(formDataWithId)); setFormData(initialState) } return (
setFormData((pre) => { return ( { ...pre, title: e.target.value } ) })} />
{setFormData((pre) => ({...pre, featuredImage: e.target.value}))}} />
